alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:36PM AKST until February 22 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected with freezing rain possible. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Total snow accumulations of 6 inches is expected south of McKinley Village. Ice accumulations of a light glaze are possible this evening. North of the Denali Park entrance, expect south winds gusting around 60 mph with blowing snow. Plan on difficult travel conditions. * WHERE...Denali. * WHEN...3 PM today to 6 PM Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Up to 6 inches of snow expected south of McKinley Village, with 2 inches to the north. North of the Denali Park entrance, expect south winds gusting around 60 mph with blowing snow. Snow and winds will taper off Tuesday afternoon. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
